name: Fish Shift
description:
Control different fish to get to the end of the level in this puzzle prototype game.

Developed by Ben Thompson

Controls:

  • WASD - Move Fish
  • Mouse - Turn Camera
  • Space - Use Fish Ability
  • Shift - Shift Into Other Fish
  • Backspace  - Menu
